LanguageData.I_EMSpeedSma.label: 紋身套裝 (眼鏡蛇 - 小)
LanguageData.I_EMSpeedSma.description: 一套眼鏡蛇紋身的模版與墨水，材料夠將手/腳覆蓋。能輕微強化移動速度，但相對進食變得耗時。
LanguageData.I_EMSpeedMed.label: 紋身套裝 (眼鏡蛇 - 中)
LanguageData.I_EMSpeedMed.description: 一套眼鏡蛇紋身的模版與墨水，材料夠將手臂/腿部覆蓋。這種設計適度地提高了移動速度。可能使進食變得耗時。
LanguageData.I_EMSpeedBig.label: 紋身套裝 (眼鏡蛇 - 大)
LanguageData.I_EMSpeedBig.description: 一套眼鏡蛇紋身的模版與墨水，材料夠將胸部/背部覆蓋。這種設計大大提高了速度。可能使進食變得耗時。
LanguageData.I_EMPainSma.label: 紋身套裝 (獨角獸 - 小)
LanguageData.I_EMPainSma.description: 一套獨角獸紋身的模版與墨水，材料夠將手/腳覆蓋。 This design decreases pain a little. Will make you a little more susceptible to the elements.
LanguageData.I_EMPainMed.label: 紋身套裝 (獨角獸 - 中)
LanguageData.I_EMPainMed.description: 一套獨角獸紋身的模版與墨水，材料夠將手臂/腿部覆蓋。This design decreases pain by a modest amount. Will make you a little more susceptible to the elements.
LanguageData.I_EMPainBig.label: 紋身套裝 (獨角獸 - 大)
LanguageData.I_EMPainBig.description: 一套獨角獸紋身的模版與墨水，材料夠將胸部/背部覆蓋。This design decreases pain by a sizeable amount. Will make you a little more susceptible to the elements.
LanguageData.I_EMManipSma.label: 紋身套裝 (猴子 - 小)
LanguageData.I_EMManipSma.description: 一套猴子紋身的模版與墨水，材料夠將手/腳覆蓋。 This design increases manipulation a little. Psychic phenomena are a little more effective too.

LanguageData.I_EMConSma.label: 紋身套裝 (機械族 - 小)
LanguageData.I_EMConSma.description: 一套機械族紋身的模版與墨水，材料夠將手/腳覆蓋。 This design increases consciousness a little, it is also scary for others to look at.

LanguageData.I_EMBreakSma.description: 一套毛牛紋身的模版與墨水，材料夠將手/腳覆蓋。 This design increases mental break threshold a little. Makes movement a little slower.

LanguageData.I_EMBloodSma.description: 一套蟲族紋身的模版與墨水，材料夠將手/腳覆蓋。 This design increases blood pumping a little. It will also reduce learning speed a little.
